name: My Racing Career
summary: This is a car racing for the theme of the simulation of the game,lt's not a racing game, and the game has a large number of random factors, such as random opponent strength, random events, random equipment and so on ... And the player has only one life in the game, each failure can only start a new game, so every time the game players may have a different game experience, and players can try a variety of different ways of playing. The game is still a preemptive version, but already has enough to play elements, followed by the author will add new game scenes, equipment, events and so on new elements ...(Will support English)
